info.name: Ghee Masala Dosa
info.description: Crispy masala dosa made in pure nandini ghee and served with aloo palya, 2 types of chutney and our signature drumstick sambar

info.name: Ghee Pudi Masala Dosa
info.description: Crispy on the outside and soft and fluffy on the inside, our ghee pudi masala dosas are roasted to perfection in pure nandini ghee. We serve this with a combination of chutney pudi and aloo palya on the inside and 2 types of chutneys and our signature drumstick sambar.

info.name: Ghee Garlic Masala Dosa
info.description: Appetizing dosa made in nandini ghee anda generous portion of garic masala is served with 2 types of chutney & our signature drumstick sambar

info.name: Open Butter Masala Dosa
info.description:
This fluffy ghee-roasted dosa is accompanied
with our melt-in-your-mouth aloo palya and a dollop of butter on top. Garnished
with fresh cilantro, coconut and carrots shavings, each bite delivers flavours that
are guaranteed to satisfy your dosa cravings any time of the day or night.

info.name: Ghee Garlic Roast Dosa

info.name: Dum Rice Special - Aloo Gobi Rice
info.description:
Dum is derived from the persian word dumpukht which means air-cooked or baked. 
chunks of potato, cauliflower florets & spices cooked togather to make a wholesome meal.

info.name: Dum Rice Special - Tomato Rice
info.description:
Dum is derived from the persian word dumpukht which means air-cooked or baked. 
tomato dum rice is a popular rice dish from the tamil nadu cuisine. It is a slightly spicy rice dish that is made with tomato, spices and rice

info.name: Dum Rice Special - Ghee Rice + Khurma
info.description:
Dum is derived from the persian word dumpukht which means air-cooked or baked. 
ghee rice is a classic and super aromatic south indian meal made with rice, ghee, whole spices, onions, cashews and raisins accompanied with vegetable khurma, it is one of the favourites.

info.name: Ghee Akki Roti (1 Pc)
info.description: Delicious roti made of rice flour enriched in nandini ghee and served with pudi, 2 types of chutney & vegetable saagu

info.name: Ghee Ragi Roti (1 Pc)
info.description: Delicious roti made of finger millet flour enriched in nandini ghee and served with pudi, 2 types of chutney & vegetable saagu

info.name: Malabar Parotta (1 pc)
info.description: Our irresistible Parotta! With its flaky texture, buttery goodness, and aromatic spices, it's a culinary journey not to be missed.

info.name: Akkaravadisal
info.description:
This 1000 yr old recipe tastes rich, smooth & creamy. Ghee is added for more delicious & rich flavors.
akkara adisil is a special prasadam/neiveidyam in srirangam temple, during the panguni uthiram festival divine couple, the lord ranganathar and goddess ranganayaki are seen together

info.name: Gulab Jamoon (1)
info.description:
Serves 1
all time favorite Indian dessert

info.name: Masala Vada (4 Pcs)
info.description: Masala means a mixture of spices and vada is a fried lentil snack. So masala vada translates to a fried snack made with lentils and spices
